recipes.title: Vegan PhỞ Noodle Salad
recipes.shortDescription: Thanks to this recipe from Real Food Really Fast, we’re savoring the tempting flavors of Vietnamese phở without slaving over a hot stove.

recipes.title: Vegan Warm Kale Salad with Roasted Sweet Potatoes
recipes.shortDescription: This kale salad features flavors of fall thanks to roasted sweet potatoes, cranberries, and a maple vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Sweet & Spicy Noodle Salad
recipes.shortDescription: Loaded with fresh, revitalizing ingredients that are sure to spice up your lunch, this healthy meal will leave your stomach satiated and your tastebuds in ecstasy.

recipes.title: Chimichurri Avocado Salad
recipes.shortDescription: Buttery avocado, fragrant chimichurri, and refreshingly juicy watermelon will leave you asking for seconds of this bright, verdant salad.

recipes.title: Cool Cucumber Salad with Red Onions
recipes.shortDescription: Our easy-to-make salad is a light and refreshing addition to your next potluck or picnic.
